meanings.definition: A person who exchanges one thing for another.
meanings.sent1: The swoppers at the market were busy trading their goods.
meanings.sent2: I met a group of swoppers who were swapping books with each other.
meanings.sent3: The swoppers at the flea market were having a blast exchanging items.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the queen of swoppers, always finding the best deals.
meanings.sent5: The swoppers in the town square made the trading process look so easy.

meanings.definition: To exchange or trade items with someone else.
meanings.sent1: Let's swoppers our toys and see if we can find something new to play with.
meanings.sent2: We decided to swoppers our snacks during lunchtime.
meanings.sent3: The siblings loved to swoppers their clothes just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The neighbors would often swoppers tools to help each other out.
meanings.sent5: She would always swoppers her desserts for his savory dishes.
